children.text: Every second will keep the sizes of the bars in their correct correct value by 100%.
Every second if the "active turbo" is equal to "0" will add "0.1" of power to the character.
Every second if the "active turbo" equals "1" it will remove "0.4" from power to the character.
When the "PowerPlayer" is less than or equal to "0" will set "0" to the variable of "PowerPlayer" and "0" for the "active Turbo".
When the spaces of the enemies are on the character, it will set the value of "active" to "1" It means that it will start following the character. When it is "0" it will run behind the food.
When "Active" is equal to "1" it will move the enemy towards the character
When the enemy is or collides on the walls will be the direction of him towards the center of the screen;
